content.question: Which of the following represents a rate law for the overall reaction that is consistent with the proposed mechanism?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of H 2, times the molar concentration of I C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mtext>ICl</mtext></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
